token_magnet.name: Token Magnet
token_magnet.description: Increases token gains by 25% for 1 hour.

xp_booster.name: XP Booster
xp_booster.description: Increases XP gains by 25% for 1 hour.

rainbow_lure.name: Rainbow Lure
rainbow_lure.description: Increases shiny encounter chance by 15% for 1 hour.

rarity_charm.name: Rarity Charm
rarity_charm.description: Increases chances of finding rare Veramon by 20% for 1 hour.

ultra_capsule.name: Ultra Capsule
ultra_capsule.description: Increases catch rate by 25% for your next 5 catches.

master_capsule.name: Master Capsule
master_capsule.description: Guarantees catching any Veramon. One-time use.

shiny_reroll.name: Shiny Reroller
shiny_reroll.description: Gives a 5% chance to reroll one of your Veramon into a shiny version.

ability_booster.name: Ability Booster
ability_booster.description: Increases one of your Veramon's stats by 10%.

evolution_crystal.name: Evolution Crystal
evolution_crystal.description: Allows you to evolve a Veramon without meeting level requirements.

recovery_potion.name: Recovery Potion
recovery_potion.description: Instantly heals all of your Veramon to full health.

battle_amulet.name: Battle Amulet
battle_amulet.description: Increases battle rewards by 20% for your next 3 battles.

nickname_tag.name: Nickname Tag
nickname_tag.description: Allows you to rename one of your Veramon.

biome_scanner.name: Biome Scanner
biome_scanner.description: Reveals all Veramon types in a biome for 30 minutes.

lucky_egg.name: Lucky Egg
lucky_egg.description: Doubles XP gain for your next 10 Veramon catches.

premium_token_pack.name: Premium Token Pack
premium_token_pack.description: A premium item that grants 2500 tokens instantly.

shiny_charm.name: Shiny Charm
shiny_charm.description: Permanently increases shiny encounter rate by 5%.
